title: Remote Scheduling Coordinator – EST Shift | Full-Time
job_overview:
About Us
Stellar Personnel is a fast-growing Canadian staffing company serving hospitality, events, and logistics clients across the country. We work with some of the most recognizable venues and brands in Canada.

We are hiring a Remote Staffing Coordinator to support our shift fulfillment operations. This role is ideal for someone with strong experience in staffing logistics, worker communication, and operational problem-solving.

Key Responsibilities
Assign and monitor shifts using Nowsta

Communicate with contractors and teaUpgrade to see actual infombers via Slack

Track shift completion, attendance, and fulfillment in Google Sheets

Respond to last-minute changes, cancellations, or coverage gaps professionally and efficiently

Ensure accurate and timely updates to all platforms and internal logs

Follow escalation procedures and SOPs as required

 Required Skills & Experience
Minimum 3 years of experience in high-volume staffing coordination

Proven ability to manage multiple shifts, workers, and client accounts simultaneously

Proficient in Slack, Nowsta, and Google Sheets

Excellent written and spoken English

Strong attention to detail and a high level of responsiveness

Able to work full-time night shift (PH time: 9:30 PM–6:00 AM)

Reliable internet and a quiet, dedicated home workspace

 Schedule & Commitment
Full-time: 40 hours/week

Long-term opportunity with consistent workload

What You Can Expect
Structured workflows and systems for clarity and efficiency

Collaborative team environment with clear communication channels

Exposure to large-scale staffing operations across Canada

Real opportunity to grow and take ownership of critical scheduling functions

To Apply:
Submit your OnlineJobs.ph profile and include a brief note summarizing your experience with high-volume staffing and your proficiency with Slack, Nowsta, and Google Sheets. Shortlisted applicants will proceed to an assessment.
